name: Puzzle Arena
description:
Controls 

Use the arrow keys to move the player. 

Matching 

If you have ever played Puzzles and Dragons, our matching mechanic should feel very similar. To match combos, click and drag on an orb to swap it with its neighbors (you can swap as many times as you want).  A horizontal/vertical match of 3 or more orbs of the same color constitutes a combo. 

Goal

Clear the town of all the slimes! To start a battle, simply walk into the slime. 

Stay in the menu screen for a surprise!

Known Issues

If you drag an orb outside of the board bounds and let go of the cursor, the orbs will not match. The same issues arises if you drag the orb and your cursor is let go outside of the game canvas.
